item.description:
Hello Happy Hour Members!

I'm hosting my first Happy Hour Meetup at Silvertone Bar and Grill. Once you enter at 69 Bromfield Street, the bar and restaurant are located downstairs. This spot is one of my favorite places in Boston and serves up great cocktails and food. Central location (only a 2' walk from Park Street 'T'), great way to start the end-of-the-work-week celebration and prime time to chat with old friends and make new ones. Who could ask for anything more....?

See you at the bar!

Yours,

Adrienne

Silvertone Bar and Grill
69 Bromfield Street
Boston, MA 02108

http://boston.citysea...

Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab
item.name: Silvertone - Let's Mingle!
